snippet.title: codebasics
snippet.description:
Friends, My name is Dhaval Patel and I have more than 15 years of experience working as a software engineer. I've worked with Nvidia Graphics and Bloomberg LP (Global financial data provider). Teaching has been my passion and I strongly believe "Anyone Can Code" ! No matter what your background and past skill set is, you can learn programming if it is taught in a simplistic and intuitive way. The goal of this channel is to fulfill this vision by teaching the programming in most simplest and intuitive manner.

Disclaimer: All the content and opinion expressed on this channel are of my own and not of my employer's.
